⟩ Drinks ⟩

Iced Coffee

  • Vegetarian/Vegan

To make 200ml * 10g sugar * 1/2 tsp cocoa powder (optional) * 160ml cold milk * 40ml hot water * 5g good instant coffee

Mix coffee, sugar and hot water in a jug until dissolved

Add cocoa powder if desired

Mix in cold milk and chill for several hours

Built with NYUM. Enjoy!

Updated on 2022-01-17
